public interface SAMLAttributeQueryRequestBuilder

buildAttributeQueryRequest

org.opensaml.saml2.core.AttributeQuery buildAttributeQueryRequest(String identifier,

Method to build a SAML AttributeQuery request for a user with given identifier.

Parameters:
openid - : the user's OpenID.
issuer - : the identity issuing the request.
Returns:
the SAML attribute query request.
